wikipedia_page.main: Stephanie Donaldson is an editor and garden author specializing in organic methods, and her expertise in organic gardening led to her co-authoring the Prince of Wales’s book The Elements of Organic Gardening - Prince Charles, the Royal Gardener, released by Kales Press in March 2007.

response: * HRH The Prince of Wales and Stephanie Donaldson. The Elements of Organic Gardening. Kales, 2007.
